member.name: M:Ultraviolet.Core.Data.MersenneTwister.Next(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a nonnegative random number less than the specified maximum.
member.param: The exclusive upper bound of the random number to be generated. maxValue must be greater than or equal to zero.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to zero, and less than maxValue; that is, the range of return values ordinarily includes zero but not maxValue. However, if maxValue equals zero, maxValue is returned.

member.name: M:Ultraviolet.Core.Data.MersenneTwister.Next(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a random number within a specified range.
member.param: The inclusive lower bound of the random number returned.
The exclusive upper bound of the random number returned. maxValue must be greater than or equal to minValue.
member.returns: A 32-bit signed integer greater than or equal to minValue and less than maxValue; that is, the range of return values includes minValue but not maxValue. If minValue equals maxValue, minValue is returned.

member.name: T:Ultraviolet.Core.IO.NamespaceDoc
member.summary: The namespace contains classes that expand upon the Base Class Library's basic input/output functionality, and which assist with the serialization and deserialization of the Ultraviolet core library's custom types.

member.name: T:Ultraviolet.Core.LibraryLoader
member.summary: Contains methods for dynamically loading native libraries based on the current operating system and the process' bitness.

remarks.para: The class is used to dynamically load native libraries prior to invoking their functions through Platform Invocation Services (P/Invoke). This gives us greater control over where the libraries are loaded from, allowing us to ensure that the appropriate version of the library is loaded for the current operating system and process bitness.

When running under Mono, this functionality can instead be provided by Mono's DllMaps functionality. See the Mono documentation at http://www.mono-project.com/docs/advanced/pinvoke/dllmap/ for more information.

member.name: T:Ultraviolet.Core.MaskedUInt32
member.summary: Represents a masked 32-bit integer.
member.remarks: Masking allows an integer to be stored, on average, with fewer than 4 bytes of memory. To do this, the integer value is treated as a sequence of bytes, and any bytes which have a value of zero are omitted from the output stream. Masking requires the integer value to be prepended with an additional byte of data, the masking byte, which tracks which integer bytes have non-zero values; this means that the size of a masked 32-bit integer is 2 bytes in the best case and 5 bytes in the worst case.

member.name: T:Ultraviolet.Core.Text.ILocalizationPlugin
member.summary: Represents a plugin for the Ultraviolet localization system.

member.name: M:Ultraviolet.Core.Text.ILocalizationPlugin.GetPluralityEvaluators
member.summary: Gets the plurality evaluators provided by this plugin. Plurality groups are used to categorize words by quantity. In English, there is only a singular (one) and a plural (many) group, but in some languages there are more.
member.returns: The collection of plurality group evaluators provided by this plugin.

member.name: M:Ultraviolet.Core.Text.ILocalizationPlugin.GetMatchEvaluators
member.summary: Gets the match evaluators provided by this plugin. Match evaluators are used to make words "agree" with one another. For example, the French language rules include a match evaluator called 'Def_art' which evaluates to either Les, Le, La, or L' depending on the word being matched.
member.returns: The collection of match evaluators provided by this plugin.

member.name: P:Ultraviolet.Core.Text.ILocalizationPlugin.Language
member.summary: Gets the two-letter language code of the language provided by this plugin. Only one of and should have a non-null value; if both are non-null, then takes precedence.

member.name: P:Ultraviolet.Core.Text.ILocalizationPlugin.Culture
member.summary: Gets the culture code of the culture provided by this plugin. Only one of and should have a non-null value; if both are non-null, then takes precedence.

member.name: T:Ultraviolet.Core.Text.LocalizationPluralityEvaluator
member.summary: Represents a method which is used to determine the plurality group associated with a specified quantity.
member.param: The localized string which is being pluralized.
The quantity for which to determine a plurality group.
member.returns: The name of the plurality group associated with the specified quantity.

member.name: T:Ultraviolet.Core.Text.LocalizationMatchEvaluator
member.summary: Represents a method which is used to determine which of the specified source string's variants is the best match for the specified target variant.
member.param: The source string from which to retrieve a variant.
The target string to match.
member.returns: The variant of the source string that is the best match for the specified target variant.

member.name: T:Ultraviolet.Core.Text.Localization
member.summary: Contains methods for managing the application's localized string tables.

member.name: M:Ultraviolet.Core.Text.Localization.#cctor
